Title: Review after 2 months of usage
Content: I am writing this review after almost 2 months of usage of this Power Styler Beard Trimmer.Must say it has a very good battery backup till now, it was fully charged in February and with regular use every week. Its still working fine.Blades are smooth which doesn't make any cut while using.However, Blades only works upside down not vice a versa. It helps to fine trimming quality at your neck area. All in all a must buy product at this price range.

Title: Performance
Content: Performance is not so good. Previously I was using philips trimmer and as compared to that it is very low quality product.So if you are looking for a good trimmer for long durability, I will suggest philips.If you looking for low price trimmer then you can go for it.

Format: Style Name: Black trimmer & Beard Shaper Tool
Title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Poor Build Quality ‚Äì Feels Cheap & Unreliable! ‚ö†Ô∏è
Content: I regret purchasing this trimmer and would **not recommend it** to anyone looking for durability or performance. Here‚Äôs why:‚ùå **Flimsy Construction**: The body is made of **very thin, brittle plastic** that feels like it could crack any moment. For the same price, brands like Philips or others offer **far sturdier trimmers**.‚ùå **Unreliable Blades**: The cutting blades are **low-quality** and struggle with even medium-density hair. After just a few uses, they started pulling hairs instead of cutting cleanly.‚ùå **Questionable Packaging**: The beard shaper attachment arrived **full of scratches**, looking like a **used or refurbished item**. No explanation or apology from the seller.‚ùå **Short Lifespan**: I doubt this will last beyond a few months. Already showing signs of wear after **just 2-3 uses**.**Final Verdict**: Save your money! This is a **budget product with budget problems**‚Äîweak materials, poor performance, and zero durability. Spend a little extra for a trusted brand instead.
